<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[General Susumu (The Black Daimyo)](/Deities.aspx?ID=176)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>
<trait label="LE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
</traits>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gods & Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=17) pg. 132 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Tian Gods](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=16)

**Edicts** Seek glory in battle, loudly proclaim your victories, protect your possessions and strongholds

**Anathema** Cower from fights, refuse a challenge from an equal, mistreat your weapons, abuse your mount

**Follower Alignments**
LN, LE

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Ability](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Strength or Dexterity

**Divine Font** [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146)

**Divine Skill** [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3)

**Favored Weapon** [Longbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=76)

**Domains** [Confidence](/Domains.aspx?ID=4), [Destruction](/Domains.aspx?ID=8), [Might](/Domains.aspx?ID=20), [Zeal](/Domains.aspx?ID=37)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** 

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[True Strike](/Spells.aspx?ID=345)

- **2nd**
[Phantom Steed](/Spells.aspx?ID=221)

- **3rd**
[Wall of Wind](/Spells.aspx?ID=367)

</column>
name: General Susumu (The Black Daimyo)
